meanings.definition: Eurypterids: A group of extinct aquatic arthropods resembling scorpions.
meanings.sent1: The eurypterids lived in the water and looked like scorpions.
meanings.sent2: Researchers discovered eurypterids' fossils in different parts of the world.
meanings.sent3: The eurypterids threw a party in the ocean, inviting all their arthropod friends.
meanings.sent4: The eurypterids ruled the ancient seas like mighty scorpion kings.
meanings.sent5: Imagine a sea full of eurypterids, each one a scorpion of the deep.

meanings.definition: Eurypterids: Fossilized remains of eurypterids have been found in various locations around the world.
meanings.sent1: Explorers uncovered eurypterids' fossilized remains worldwide.
meanings.sent2: Many museums display the fossilized remains of eurypterids.
meanings.sent3: The eurypterids left their fossilized remains as souvenirs for future generations.
meanings.sent4: The fossilized remains of eurypterids tell stories of ancient oceans.
meanings.sent5: In every corner of the globe, you can find traces of eurypterids' fossilized remains.

meanings.definition: Eurypterids: Scientists study eurypterids to learn more about ancient marine ecosystems.
meanings.sent1: Researchers investigate eurypterids to understand past marine environments.
meanings.sent2: Studying eurypterids helps scientists unlock secrets of ancient seas.
meanings.sent3: The eurypterids joined the marine science class to learn about themselves.
meanings.sent4: Eurypterids are like time capsules revealing the mysteries of ancient oceans.
meanings.sent5: Through studying eurypterids, scientists glimpse into the past of marine ecosystems.
